headline: PNC Bank, N.A. Changes Prime Rate
summary: PITTSBURGH, Dec. 18, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- PNC Bank, N.A. announced a decrease in its prime lending rate. The new rate of 7.50% is effective tomorrow, Dec. 19, 2024.PNC Bank, National Association, is...

headline: PNC Financial: A Balanced Approach Calls For A Hold Rating
summary: PNC Financial Services Group holds potential for long-term growth, but current valuation and technical indicators suggest caution for short-term buying. Learn more on PNC stock here.
